segments.source_content:
---
id: react
description: Using the power of React in Docusaurus Markdown documents, thanks to MDX
slug: /markdown-features/react
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # MDX and React

translations.zh-hant: # MDX 與 React
@@untranslatable_placeholder_71d8dc9b

segments.source_content: ## Using JSX in Markdown {#using-jsx-in-markdown}

translations.zh-hant: ## 在 Markdown 中使用 JSX {#using-jsx-in-markdown}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has built-in support for [MDX v1](https://mdxjs.com/), which allows you to write JSX within your Markdown files and render them as React components.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 內建支援 [MDX v1](https://mdxjs.com/)，允許你在 Markdown 檔案中編寫 JSX 並將其渲染為 React 元件。

segments.source_content:
:::note

While Docusaurus parses both `.md` and `.mdx` files using MDX, some of the syntaxes are treated slightly differently by third-party tools. For the most accurate parsing and better editor support, we recommend using the `.mdx` extension for files containing MDX syntax.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

雖然 Docusaurus 使用 MDX 解析 `.md` 和 `.mdx` 檔案，但某些語法在第三方工具中的處理方式略有不同。為了獲得最準確的解析和更好的編輯器支援，我們建議對包含 MDX 語法的檔案使用 `.mdx` 副檔名。

:::

segments.source_content: Check out the [MDX docs](https://mdxjs.com/) to see what other fancy stuff you can do with MDX.

translations.zh-hant: 查看 [MDX 文件](https://mdxjs.com/) 以了解你還能用 MDX 實現哪些酷炫功能。

segments.source_content: ### Exporting components {#exporting-components}

translations.zh-hant: ### 匯出元件 {#exporting-components}

segments.source_content: To define any custom component within an MDX file, you have to export it: only paragraphs that start with `export` will be parsed as components instead of prose.

translations.zh-hant: 要在 MDX 檔案中定義任何自訂元件，你必須將其匯出：只有以 `export` 開頭的段落才會被解析為元件而非普通文字。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b017063d

segments.source_content: Notice how it renders both the markup from your React component and the Markdown syntax:

translations.zh-hant: 請注意它如何同時渲染你的 React 元件的標記和 Markdown 語法：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_64b6f348

segments.source_content: :::warning[MDX is JSX] Since all doc files are parsed using MDX, anything that looks like HTML is actually JSX. Therefore, if you need to inline-style a component, follow JSX flavor and provide style objects. {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx /* Instead of this: */ Foo /* Use this: */ Foo ``` This behavior is different from Docusaurus 1. See also [Migrating from v1 to v2](../../migration/migration-manual.mdx). In addition, MDX is not [100% compatible with CommonMark](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018). Use the **[MDX playground](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground)** to ensure that your syntax is valid MDX. :::

translations.zh-hant: :::warning[MDX 就是 JSX] 由於所有文件都是使用 MDX 解析的，任何看起來像 HTML 的東西實際上都是 JSX。因此，如果你需要內聯樣式一個元件，請遵循 JSX 風格並提供樣式物件。 {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx /* 不要這樣做： */ Foo /* 應該這樣做： */ Foo ``` 這種行為與 Docusaurus 1 不同。另請參閱 [從 v1 遷移到 v2](../../migration/migration-manual.mdx)。 此外，MDX 與 [CommonMark 並非 100% 相容](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3018)。使用 **[MDX 遊樂場](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground)** 確保你的語法是有效的 MDX。 :::

segments.source_content: ### Importing components {#importing-components}

translations.zh-hant: ### 匯入元件 {#importing-components}

segments.source_content: You can also import your own components defined in other files or third-party components installed via npm.

translations.zh-hant: 你也可以匯入在其他檔案中定義的自訂元件，或透過 npm 安裝的第三方元件。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_7fa46732

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The `@site` alias points to your website's directory, usually where the `docusaurus.config.js` file is. Using an alias instead of relative paths (`'../../src/components/BrowserWindow'`) saves you from updating import paths when moving files around, or when [versioning docs](../docs/versioning.mdx) and [translating](../../i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

`@site` 別名指向你的網站目錄，通常是 `docusaurus.config.js` 檔案所在的位置。使用別名而非相對路徑（`'../../src/components/BrowserWindow'`）可以避免在移動檔案或進行[文件版本控制](../docs/versioning.mdx)和[翻譯](../../i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx)時更新匯入路徑。

:::

segments.source_content: While declaring components within Markdown is very convenient for simple cases, it becomes hard to maintain because of limited editor support, risks of parsing errors, and low reusability. Use a separate `.js` file when your component involves complex JS logic:

translations.zh-hant: 雖然在 Markdown 中宣告元件對於簡單情況非常方便，但由於編輯器支援有限、解析錯誤的風險和低可重用性，維護起來會變得困難。當你的元件涉及複雜的 JS 邏輯時，請使用單獨的 `.js` 檔案：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_83537d8d

segments.source_content:
```md title="markdown-file.mdx"
import Highlight from '@site/src/components/Highlight';

<Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_18fb666f

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you use the same component across a lot of files, you don't need to import it everywhere—consider adding it to the global scope. [See below](#mdx-component-scope)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

如果你在多個檔案中使用相同的元件，不需要在每個地方都匯入它——考慮將其添加到全域範圍。[參見下文](#mdx-component-scope)

:::

segments.source_content: ### MDX component scope {#mdx-component-scope}

translations.zh-hant: ### MDX 元件作用域 {#mdx-component-scope}

segments.source_content: Apart from [importing a component](#importing-components) and [exporting a component](#exporting-components), a third way to use a component in MDX is to **register it to the global scope**, which will make it automatically available in every MDX file, without any import statements.

translations.zh-hant: 除了[匯入元件](#importing-components)和[匯出元件](#exporting-components)之外，第三種在 MDX 中使用元件的方法是**將其註冊到全域作用域**，這將使其自動在所有 MDX 檔案中可用，無需任何匯入語句。

segments.source_content: For example, given this MDX file:

translations.zh-hant: 例如，給定這個 MDX 檔案：

segments.source_content:
```md
- a
- list!

And some <Highlight>custom markup</Highlight>...
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7d56fc4b

segments.source_content: It will be compiled to a React component containing `ul`, `li`, `p`, and `Highlight` elements. `Highlight` is not a native html element: you need to provide your own React component implementation for it.

translations.zh-hant: 它將被編譯為包含 `ul`、`li`、`p` 和 `Highlight` 元素的 React 元件。`Highlight` 不是原生的 html 元素：你需要為其提供自己的 React 元件實現。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus, the MDX component scope is provided by the `@theme/MDXComponents` file. It's not a React component, _per se_, unlike most other exports under the `@theme/` alias: it is a record from tag names like `Highlight` to their React component implementations.

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus 中，MDX 元件作用域由 `@theme/MDXComponents` 檔案提供。嚴格來說，它並非 React 元件（與大多數 `@theme/` 別名下的匯出不同），而是一個從標籤名稱（如 `Highlight`）映射到其實作 React 元件的記錄。

segments.source_content: If you [swizzle](../../swizzling.mdx) this component, you will find all tags that have been implemented, and you can further customize our implementation by swizzling the respective sub-component, like `@theme/MDXComponents/Code` (which is used to render [Markdown code blocks](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx)).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您[替換](../../swizzling.mdx)此元件，將會看到所有已實作的標籤，並可透過替換相應子元件（如 `@theme/MDXComponents/Code`，用於渲染[Markdown 程式碼區塊](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx)）進一步自訂我們的實作。

segments.source_content: If you want to register extra tag names (like the `<Highlight>` tag above), you should consider [wrapping `@theme/MDXComponents`](../../swizzling.mdx#wrapping), so you don't have to maintain all the existing mappings. Since the swizzle CLI doesn't allow wrapping non-component files yet, you should manually create the wrapper:

translations.zh-hant: 若需註冊額外標籤名稱（如上述 `<Highlight>` 標籤），建議考慮[包裝 `@theme/MDXComponents`](../../swizzling.mdx#wrapping)，這樣就不需維護所有現有映射。由於替換 CLI 尚不支援包裝非元件檔案，您需手動建立包裝器：

segments.source_content: And now, you can freely use `<Highlight>` in every page, without writing the import statement:

translations.zh-hant: 現在，您可以在每個頁面中自由使用 `<Highlight>`，而無需撰寫匯入語句：

segments.source_content:
```md
I can conveniently use <Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight> everywhere!
```

```mdx-code-block
<BrowserWindow>

I can conveniently use <Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight> everywhere!

</BrowserWindow>
```

:::warning

We use **upper-case** tag names like `Highlight` on purpose.

From MDX v2+ onward (Docusaurus v3+), lower-case tag names are always rendered as native html elements, and will not use any component mapping you provide.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

我們刻意使用**大寫**標籤名稱（如 `Highlight`）。

從 MDX v2+ 開始（Docusaurus v3+），小寫標籤名稱將始終渲染為原生 HTML 元素，且不會使用您提供的任何元件映射。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Markdown and JSX interoperability {#markdown-and-jsx-interoperability}

translations.zh-hant: ### Markdown 與 JSX 的互通性 {#markdown-and-jsx-interoperability}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2 is using MDX v1, which has a lot of known cases where the content fails to be correctly parsed as Markdown. Use the **[MDX playground](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground)** to ensure that your syntax is valid MDX.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v2 使用 MDX v1，存在許多已知情況會導致內容無法正確解析為 Markdown。請使用 **[MDX 遊樂場](https://mdx-git-renovate-babel-monorepo-mdx.vercel.app/playground)** 確保您的語法是有效的 MDX。

segments.source_content:
Samples of parsing failures **A paragraph starting with a JSX tag will be seen entirely as a JSX string:** ```mdx-code-block
``` ```jsx Highlighted text but afterwards _Markdown_ **doesn't work** ``` ```mdx-code-block
Highlighted text but afterwards _Markdown_ **doesn't work**
Use JSX for the rest of the line, or prefix the line with some plain text:
``` ```jsx Use JSX for the paragraph to stop worrying about Markdown ​← This is a zero-width space and afterwards Markdown works ``` ```mdx-code-block
Use JSX for the paragraph to stop worrying about Markdown ​← This is a zero-width space and afterwards Markdown works
**Markdown within a JSX tag never works:**
``` ```jsx **Bold doesn't work** ``` ```mdx-code-block
**Bold doesn't work**
Use JSX within JSX tag, or move the Markdown to the outer layer:
``` ```jsx Bold now works **Bold now works** ``` ```mdx-code-block
Bold now works **Bold now works**
**Text immediately below a JSX tag will be seen as JSX text:**
``` {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx
**Bold still doesn't work**
``` ```mdx-code-block
**Bold still doesn't work**
Add an empty new line:
``` {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx
**Bold now works**
``` ```mdx-code-block
**Bold now works**
**Markdown text indented by four spaces will be seen as a code block:**
``` {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx
You may think I'm just some text...
``` ```mdx-code-block
You may think I'm just some text...
Don't indent:
``` {/* prettier-ignore */} ```jsx
Now I'm actually just text
``` ```mdx-code-block
Now I'm actually just text
```
## Importing code snippets {#importing-code-snippets}

translations.zh-hant: ## 匯入程式碼片段 {#importing-code-snippets}

segments.source_content: You can not only import a file containing a component definition, but also import any code file as raw text, and then insert it in a code block, thanks to [Webpack raw-loader](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/raw-loader/). In order to use `raw-loader`, you first need to install it in your project:

translations.zh-hant: 您不僅可以匯入包含元件定義的檔案，還能透過 [Webpack raw-loader](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/raw-loader/) 將任何程式碼檔案作為原始文字匯入，並插入至程式碼區塊中。要使用 `raw-loader`，需先在專案中安裝：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save raw-loader
```
Now you can import code snippets from another file as it is:

translations.zh-hant: 現在您可以從其他檔案原樣匯入程式碼片段：

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock';
import MyComponentSource from '!!raw-loader!@site/src/pages/examples/_myComponent';

<BrowserWindow>

<CodeBlock language="jsx">{MyComponentSource}</CodeBlock>

</BrowserWindow>
```
See [using code blocks in JSX](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#usage-in-jsx) for more details of the `<CodeBlock>` component.

translations.zh-hant: 詳見 [JSX 中的程式碼區塊用法](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#usage-in-jsx) 以瞭解 `<CodeBlock>` 元件的更多細節。

segments.source_content:
:::note

You have to use `<CodeBlock>` rather than the Markdown triple-backtick ` ``` `, because the latter will ship out any of its content as-is, but you want to interpolate the imported text here.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

您必須使用 `<CodeBlock>` 而非 Markdown 的三重反引號 ` ``` `，因為後者會直接輸出其內容，而此處您需要插入匯入的文字。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This feature is experimental and might be subject to breaking API changes in the future.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

此功能為實驗性質，未來可能會有破壞性 API 變更。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Importing Markdown {#importing-markdown}

translations.zh-hant: ## 匯入 Markdown {#importing-markdown}

segments.source_content: You can use Markdown files as components and import them elsewhere, either in Markdown files or in React pages.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以將 Markdown 檔案作為元件使用，並在其他 Markdown 檔案或 React 頁面中匯入它們。

segments.source_content: By convention, using the **`_` filename prefix** will not create any doc page and means the Markdown file is a **"partial"**, to be imported by other files.

translations.zh-hant: 依照慣例，使用 **`_` 檔案名前綴** 不會建立任何文件頁面，表示該 Markdown 檔案是一個**「部分」**內容，將被其他檔案導入使用。

segments.source_content: ```md title="_markdown-partial-example.mdx" Hello {props.name} This is text some content from `_markdown-partial-example.mdx`. ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b6fff5fe

segments.source_content:
```jsx title="someOtherDoc.mdx"
import PartialExample from './_markdown-partial-example.mdx';

<PartialExample name="Sebastien" />
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0e49382f

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
import PartialExample from './_markdown-partial-example.mdx';

<BrowserWindow>
  <PartialExample name="Sebastien" />
</BrowserWindow>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58e13dc0

segments.source_content: This way, you can reuse content among multiple pages and avoid duplicating materials.

translations.zh-hant: 透過這種方式，您可以在多個頁面間重複使用內容，避免材料重複。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Currently, the table of contents does not contain the imported Markdown headings. This is a technical limitation that we are trying to solve ([issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3915)).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

目前，目錄不包含導入的 Markdown 標題。這是一個我們正嘗試解決的技術限制 ([issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3915))。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Available exports {#available-exports}

translations.zh-hant: ## 可用導出項目 {#available-exports}

segments.source_content: Within the MDX page, the following variables are available as globals:

translations.zh-hant: 在 MDX 頁面中，以下變數可作為全域變數使用：

- `frontMatter`: 前頁資料（front matter），以字串鍵值對的形式記錄；
- `toc`: 目錄，以標題樹狀結構呈現。另請參閱 [行內目錄](./markdown-features-toc.mdx#inline-table-of-contents) 以了解更具體的應用場景。
- `contentTitle`: Markdown 標題，即 Markdown 文字中的第一個 `h1` 標題。如果不存在（例如在前頁資料中指定了標題），則為 `undefined`。

segments.source_content:
```jsx import TOCInline from '@theme/TOCInline'; import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock'; The table of contents for this page, serialized: {JSON.stringify(toc, null, 2)} The front matter of this page:
    {Object.entries(frontMatter).map(([key, value]) =>
  • {key}: {value}
    • )}

The title of this page is: {contentTitle}

```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_216de978

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block import TOCInline from '@theme/TOCInline'; The table of contents for this page, serialized: {JSON.stringify(toc, null, 2)} The front matter of this page:
    {Object.entries(frontMatter).map(([key, value]) =>
  • {key}: {value}
    • )}

The title of this page is: {contentTitle}

 ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3f9e217d
